title: 一安装工业2就崩溃
author: t39795
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to F:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-10-21_21.46.08-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: 天空の遗迹
replies.txt_content: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Slot 239 is already occupied by ic2.core.block.BlockITNT@1fb6be4 when adding ruby.bamboo.block.BlockBamboo@1688760工业和竹mod在239的ID上冲突了，请修改cfg。方法请参见：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-116253-1-1.html

replies.author: chuyimo
replies.txt_content: 同求 始终搞不定那个mojang  这个文件 知道是这个文件与mod有冲突 但解决不了
